translations: 使朝向一边；使……向侧面（lateralize 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: In addition to external magnetic stimuli, recent findings in visually restricted birds have described a hemispherically lateralized interpretation of this information within the brain.
sentences.translation: 另外，最近研究发现磁场信息的感知分析功能有明显的单侧优势特征。
